task_summary: The robot must reach the blue pen while avoiding obstacles detected en route.

task_long_description.overview: This task requires a manipulator robot to locate and approach a blue pen, positioned behind one or more obstacles, likely books. The robot uses visual perception to detect and localize the pen and obstacle(s), plans a motion trajectory that avoids collision (e.g., moving above or around obstacles), and aligns with the pen to finally reach it. Robust perception and obstacle avoidance are pivotal constraints.
preconditions: The robot starts from a fixed pose in front of the table.
Blue pen and at least one obstacle are present.
stepwise_plan: Visually search for the blue pen.
Confirm detection and estimate position of pen.
Move above the pen to prepare for an approach.
Detect or confirm position of the obstacle(s).
Execute a sideways move to avoid collision with the obstacle.
Align with and approach the blue pen.
Move to the blue pen position.
success_criteria: Robot end-effector reaches the blue pen without contacting the obstacle.
Blue pen remains undisturbed at the end of the episode.
failure_and_recovery: Failure: Obstacle detected on the path—robot retries visual scan.
Failure: Pen not found—robot re-scans up to 3 times.
Failure: Imprecise approach—robot retries movement or alignment step.
task_long_description.termination: Task ends when the robot reaches the blue pen (IsAt target reports success) or after all retries/timeouts are exhausted.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Check if the blue pen is visible to the perception module.
Actively search for the blue pen using a raster scanning pattern.
Attempt to localize the blue pen with vision.
Move the end-effector above the blue pen to prepare for approach.
Check if the obstacle (e.g., book) is visible.
Attempt to localize the obstacle visually.
Move sideways along the Y axis to avoid the detected obstacle.
Align end-effector precisely with the blue pen using fine tolerance.
Move directly to the estimated position of the blue pen.

recovery_strategy: Detect obstacle and sidestep before attempting approach again
assumptions: No direct symbolic 'avoid' or 'path plan' ID available; avoidance via MoveDelta is inferred from obstacle position.
Frames confirm presence of one blue pen and several books as obstacles.

expected_success_criteria: End-effector reaches blue pen with no contact with obstacles
